body.name: REOKA Memory Foam Cervical Pillow for Neck Pain Relief - Ergonomic Pillow for Front, Back, Stomach, Side Sleeper and Shoulder Sleeping - Regular Firm (Queen)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 3 mins
features: Reduce Neck & Back Pain : The Reoka cervical support pillow, introduces a gradual slope that cradles the neck from the base of the spine all the way to your head. This slope keeps your neck from being pinched due to lack of support as well as keeping your back more aligned

Sleep Comfortably in Any Position : The unique shape of the pillow accommodates a whole range of different sleeping styles. As a back sleeper pillow, the base of the neck is cradled gently. As a side sleeping pillow, the same slope makes room for your shoulder and keeps your spine straight. As a stomach sleeping pillow, the raised shape makes it easier to breathe and put your arms around

Memory Foam Support : Shaped out of premium, high-density memory foam, makes our ergonomic pillows softly support your head without sinking all the way down. Made using natural processes, this eco-friendly pillow will last for years with each day as supportive as the first day you tried it

Cool & Therapeutic Pillow : Our natural cooling pillowcase is super soft and breathable. It easily transfers your body heat throughout the pillow over night to keep the surface nice and cool. The pillow case is removable for easy washing and drying. During washing infuse with therapeutic aroma essences for an unforgettable nights sleep!

Design We are Proud Of : We designed this product specifically because we couldn't find another pillow that helped us fall asleep easily every night. We stand behind the fact that we love our product and hope you will too. We wish that it will change how you sleep for the rest of your life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing pillow, very comfortable and helped with neck pain!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my pillow yesterday and I absolutely love it! I’m a side sleeper and this works perfectly for me. Slept so good last night and no neck pain this morning!! Very happy with my new, comfy pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The medium was too firm
reviews.reviewText: If medium is that firm I can't fathom what firm is. I love that the two different sides offer more options, but I need it softer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Pillow doesn't look as fluffy as advertised. I was disappointed it didn't helped with my side sleeping because I still wake up with a sore neck. Maybe it only apply to me.Overall, pillow is nice and comfy but it just doesn't have much support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had such bad neck and back pain so I heard about this pillow and ordered it right away! I loved it as soon as I tried it. It helped so much with my neck and back pain. The pillow is so comfortable and I have been using it for a while now and it still hasn’t flattened even a little. It is just so comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True memory foam and not a cheap knock good off!!!
reviews.reviewText: Good quality product , breathes and provides support and allows for shoulder and hand placement in a comfortable position for side and back sleepers. My wife truly loves it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're a serious side/belly sleeper
reviews.reviewText: I read all the reviews before I purchased this pillow and most are accurate as far as it looking strange, and maybe being too flat.It does feel different when you lay your head down but I am confident that the way this pillow is designed it's for side sleepers one hundred percent.You have to get used to it.I order large medium. It's definitely a medium feel not too firm not soft. It really feels good. Very comfortable. I'm not feeling the arm pain laying on my side.Definitely recommend getting the size large tho, I couldn't imagine this pillow smaller. This size is perfect.I have sleep apnea and other sleep issues.I will come back in a month to give an update.As for now if you have issues side sleeping neck and arm pain from sleeping I recommend this pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for side and back sleepers but not stomach!
reviews.reviewText: We bought two, my wife who is a side and back sleeper just loves it as it relieved her neck pain for which we tried many pillows until we found this one for her but for me who is a stomach sleeper, i find that my head rest too high and I switched back to my loww profile pillow.

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally found a memory foam pillow that I could use for longer than a week!
reviews.reviewText: What I love is that I had a choice between soft, medium and firm. I love the neck support that a lot of "shaped" memory foam pillows provide. But I usually end up going back to an old pillow because the shaped pillow is just too firm.I chose the soft option and I'm happy to report that I have used it every night ever since I received it. Going on 3-4 months now.
Excelente almohada....Buen precioSolo que no se ve exactamente igual a la imagen al centro....tuve que dar unos puntos con aguja e hilo para lograr el centro igualPero lo demas bien

reviews.reviewTitle: Not that firm but really comfy
reviews.reviewText: Went for the firm version...and it isn't that firm to be honest...but it feels great on my neck and shoulders. Happy with the purchase!
After 3rd night sleeping on this - neck pain gone, sleep quality excellent, does not smell. Excellent pillow for the price. Would highly recommend.

La almohada tiene buen tamaño y es firme, yo esperaba que fuera más suave y resulto ser muy alta y muy firme, intenté por 3 noches dormir con ella y no pude. Si buscas almohada suave y no muy alta está no es para ti.
